Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory370.png'}
{3: 'Roland and Lamia stay hidden and watch the Task Force member enters the mansion.'}
{3: 'The moment she steps inside, Roland recognizes her. She is a member of the Task Force squad "Cerberus."'}
{3: 'It was them who held off Gabriel in Venus Splash Park and drove him away. Roland knows he must not underestimate them.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'I know that girl... They fired the air-burst grenades at Gabriel.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The girl opens the front door and stares blankly at the empty space.'}
{3: 'She then begins to mumble to herself, as if she has just woken up.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'It smelt good. The fragrances and the warmth...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She stands baffled in front of the house. The next moment—'}
{3: 'Roland sees the girl in white pick up a random piece of glass-like thing from the ground. She stabs it right into her arm.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: "...You were losing your mind. It was messy. I didn't feel good.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Pain wakes you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "It doesn't compromise my fighting.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The girl raises her head, looking around the room.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "(What's going on? Who is she talking to?)", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "(That doesn't sound like she's talking to a teammate. Is she linked to someone?)", 4: '1'}
{3: "If she is linked... Roland remembers what Lamia heard about the Commandant of Gray Raven. Plus, the Commandant of Cerberus isn't around either."}
{2: 'Roland', 3: '(I found you, Commandant of the Gray Raven.)', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: '(So she must be the key person of Babylonia. As long as I follow her...)', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The girl continues to stare blankly at the empty room. Mixed emotions appear on her face.'}
{3: 'Baffled, shocked, fear, followed by hope—'}
{3: 'Roland never sees the cycle and intertwining of these expressions in the same face.'}
{3: 'She then quickly runs into the room.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "Tsk, what's going on...?!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Roland has no time to think. He climbs into the room through another window that he opened earlier on.'}
